# NEVPNConnectionError.serverCertificateNotYetValid

**Case**

An error code that indicates the server certfiicate won’t be valid until some time in the future.

## Declaration

```swift
case serverCertificateNotYetValid
```

## Server certificate error codes

- **NEVPNConnectionError.serverCertificateInvalid**: An error code that indicates the server certfiicate is invalid.
- **NEVPNConnectionError.serverCertificateExpired**: An error code that indicates the server certfiicate’s validity period has passed.

items.description: An error code that indicates the server certfiicate is invalid.
